queries.description: basic test demonstrate the configurable element in test case framework

queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.col1, {tbl1}.col2, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.col1 = {tbl2}.col1 GROUP BY {tbl1}.col1, {tbl1}.col2
SELECT {tbl1}.col1 FROM {tbl1} WHERE {tbl1}.col2 > (SELECT 0.5 * SUM({tbl2}.col3) FROM {tbl2} WHERE {tbl1}.col2 = {tbl1}.col2 AND {tbl1}.col1 = {tbl2}.col1)
SELECT {tbl1}.col1, newb.sum_col3 FROM {tbl1} JOIN LATERAL (SELECT SUM(col3) as sum_col3 FROM {tbl2} WHERE col2 = {tbl1}.col2) AS newb ON TRUE
queries.h2Sql: SELECT {tbl1}.col1, newb.sum_col3 FROM {tbl1} JOIN (SELECT {tbl2}.col2, SUM({tbl2}.col3) AS sum_col3 FROM {tbl2} GROUP BY {tbl2}.col2) AS newb ON newb.col2 = {tbl1}.col2
